intents.answer: Students must submit mark sheets, transfer certificate, ID proof, passport-size photographs, and application form.

intents.answer: Yes, the campus is under 24/7 CCTV surveillance for safety and security.

intents.answer: Undergraduate courses cost Rs. 25,000 per semester, while postgraduate courses cost Rs. 50,000 per semester.
